title: Missing club
body:
I have not seen my club for a few months now, nor can I see the club tag. A friend of mine who is also in the club can see me listed in the member list and has the tag himself. Club is Aether Ninja Wizards, A(asterisk)N(asterisk)W is the tag

EDIT: asterisks messed up the tag, there are no spaces in it but forum formatting made the N italicized.

replies.body: Any club issues should be resolved, so we'd like to see why you're unable to see yours.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into your issue individually to see what's up.  We'll get back to you!
